title: Post-Game Lobby Gifting (@Riot)
body:
I actually use this feature A LOT for players that I found made the struggle (or stomp) something that I enjoyed. Lots of rage at my elo...prefer to show my appreciation of good sportsmanship with something they'll remember...not just an honor point they'll never use for anything.

I have 3.5k RP that I bought specifically for this feature and it's been sitting in my account for a long time now that this new client is out.  An update on when this feature comes back is greatly appreciated. (That said, if it's never coming back, then, please remove that gift box in post game lobby that's always grey'd out...it's just giving me false hope here...)

P.S. I'd rather not go back to the old client...no way to save my replays.

replies.body: Bump from the far-future... I want this feature back...
ive been wondering the same thing
